title: 11 Subtle Signs That a Pisces Woman Likes You

steps.title: This means you’ve made an impression on her.
steps.content: This means you’ve made an impression on her. Pisces women are daydreamers, with an imagination so vivid that they don’t always notice the people right in front of them. If she’s looking at you (and not anywhere else), then it may mean you’ve captured her attention even better than those daydreams! [1] X Research source Mutual eye contact also indicates romantic interest. Try making eye contact with her and see what happens; if she holds your gaze, then she probably likes you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: A Pisces woman might need her crush to make the first move.
steps.content: A Pisces woman might need her crush to make the first move. This is not because she’s flighty or uninterested, though. When a Pisces woman falls for someone, she falls hard! To counterbalance that she might try to protect herself—which translates as shyness. If she seems reserved or nervous, she might just be coming to terms with the fact that she does like you. [3] X Research source Does she fiddle with her clothing or jewelry? Blush when you make eye contact? Has she ever stammered or lost her train of thought when you’re talking? These common signs of shyness also imply that she likes you. [4] X Research source Don’t worry: her initial hesitation will soon turn into warmth and eagerness if she likes you. All you need to do is take the first step, and she’ll begin to open up from there!

steps.title: Does she pay attention to you, and remember details about your life?
steps.content: Does she pay attention to you, and remember details about your life? Once a Pisces woman gets a crush, she wants to connect emotionally with the object of her affection. [5] X Research source So, she’ll try and learn every detail about you that she can: your hobbies, goals, favorite foods, birthday, and everything in between. Open-ended questions (which require more than a “yes” or “no” to answer) allow people to get to know one another on a deeper level. She’ll likely ask you lots of them if she’s trying to connect with you. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces women are intuitive and quickly realize when they like someone.
steps.content: Pisces women are intuitive and quickly realize when they like someone. When she’s crushing on you, she’ll want to be involved in your life and have as much quality time with you as she can. She also won’t think twice or hesitate before saying “yes” if you ask her to hang out. If she’s making time for you in her schedule, then she likes you—and she’s well aware of it. [7] X Research source Pisces women are also known to be evasive when they’re not sure about someone; they have trouble saying “no,” as they don’t like other people to be upset. If you do sense hesitation when you ask her to spend time with you, talk to her about it before jumping to conclusions. There could be other factors besides a lack of interest at play!

steps.title: Pisces women are true romantics[8] X Expert Source Angel EyedealismAstrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. and use creativity to woo partners.
steps.content: Pisces women are true romantics [8] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. and use creativity to woo partners. She might write you a thoughtful letter or learn a song and ask you to listen to her play it. When it comes to love, Pisces women want the real thing—and they put a lot of effort into relationships right off the bat. She’ll tell you that she likes you by exercising her creative skills to get your attention and impress you! [9] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces women are empathetic and can quickly tell how you're feeling.
steps.content: Pisces women are empathetic and can quickly tell how you're feeling. When she likes you, she may even be able to see that you’re upset or anxious before you do! She’ll make plenty of effort to understand how you feel, talk you through your feelings, and listen to you for as long as you need. There’s no better shoulder to cry on than that of a Pisces, and she’ll want to be that support in your life if she can. [10] X Research source Pisces women have a deep-seated need to feel an emotional connection with their romantic partners! The best way to forge that connection is to be open and vulnerable with her about how you feel. [11] X Research source Reader Poll: We asked 820 wikiHow readers who are Pisces, and 53% of them said that the compliment they’d most like to receive would be: “You have a great heart.” [Take Poll] So if you want to impress her, you should compliment her on the empathy and kindness that she shows you.

steps.title: Does she ask where you are, if you’re okay, or if you need anything?
steps.content: Does she ask where you are, if you’re okay, or if you need anything? Pisces women naturally tend to worry about people they like, and because they have such a strong imagination, it’s easy for them to take that worry a little too far. [12] X Research source If she checks in with you often and seems to feel better as soon as she hears from you, this is a big sign that she has feelings for you. For some people, this behavior can come off as controlling. However, that isn’t her intention, and she’ll appreciate any sort of quick reassurance that all is well!

steps.title: A Pisces woman shows her trust by asking for help in practical matters.
steps.content: A Pisces woman shows her trust by asking for help in practical matters. Pisces are intelligent people, but often turn that brainpower toward more philosophical ideas rather than recalling directions or researching the best place to grab dinner. When she asks you for help, she’s telling you that she values your opinion and wants you to be someone that she can rely on for guidance. [13] X Research source Giving advice can go a long way towards building a relationship with someone. Offer thoughtful guidance when she comes to you with a problem, and she’ll appreciate you all the more for it! [14] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces women are selfless, sometimes too much so.
steps.content: Pisces women are selfless, sometimes too much so. When a Pisces woman likes you, she tends to give far more than she receives, without asking for anything in return! [15] X Research source She wants to make your life easier and happier, and she may show you that by letting you choose what the two of you do for fun or preparing a homecooked meal for you. When someone is prepared to make sacrifices for their partner, it’s a sign of real commitment—and your Pisces woman is a natural at this. She will readily sacrifice her time and money to make your day better. [16] X Research source Does she give you gifts or volunteer to drive you places when you need a ride? Her willingness to put your needs first can go above and beyond.

steps.title: A Pisces woman will begin to take the initiative when she’s invested.
steps.content: A Pisces woman will begin to take the initiative when she’s invested. Keep in mind that your Pisces will still probably be the more easygoing one in the relationship overall, but over time she’ll start to put forward her own ideas for spending time together. When she’s truly invested in the relationship, she’ll put a lot of effort into coming up with activities she knows you’ll enjoy. [17] X Research source Be patient if she doesn't do this right away; Piscean women are often more timid at the beginning of a relationship but find their footing later (once they know that you’re as committed as they are).

steps.title: She’s really trying to find out if you plan to stick around.
steps.content: She’s really trying to find out if you plan to stick around. Pisces women love to throw themselves into relationships and dream about all the possibilities between the two of you. [18] X Research source If she’s talking about plans for months in advance (or even more significant things like meeting her friends and family), she’s trying to tell you that she wants you to stay—and she hopes that you want the same thing! [19] X Research source
